sen.j: 田村大嬢（たむらのおおおとめ、生没年不詳）は、大伴宿奈麻呂の娘。
sen.e: TAMURA no Ootome (dates of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of OTOMO no Sukunamaro.
TAMURA no Ootome (dates of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of OTOMO no Sukunamaro.
TAMURA no Ootome (dates of birth and death unknown) was a daughter of OTOMO no Sukunamaro.

sen.j: 坂上大嬢・坂上二嬢の異母姉である。
sen.e: She was an older paternal half-sister of OTOMO no SAKANOUE no Oiratsume and SAKANOUE no Otoiratsume.
She was an older paternal half-sister of OTOMO no SAKANOUE no Oiratsume and SAKANOUE no Otoiratsume.
She was an older paternal half-sister of OTOMO no SAKANOUE no Oiratsume and SAKANOUE no Otoiratsume.
It is unknown who her mother was.
It is unknown who her mother was.
It is unknown who her mother was.

sen.j: 天平年間、叔父稲公より恋歌を贈られる。
sen.e: During the Tenpyo era, her uncle, Inakimi, sent her lovers poetries.
During the Tenpyo era, her uncle, Inakimi, sent her lovers poetries.
During the Tenpyo era, her uncle, Inakimi, sent her lovers poetries.

sen.j: 万葉集に残る稲公の歌8首は全て大嬢に贈った歌である。
sen.e: Eight poems of Inakimi's that appear in the Manyoshu (Collection of Ten Thousand Leaves) were all sent to Ootome.
Eight poems of Inakimi's that appear in the Manyoshu (Collection of Ten Thousand Leaves) were all sent to Ootome.
Eight poems of Inakimi's that appear in the Manyoshu (Collection of Ten Thousand Leaves) were all sent to Ootome.
